Topic.Title: DO you think Warren Buffett will increase his stake in Coca-Cola ?

Message.Msg: True! Schools might kick out the vending machines , but do kids really want to drink milk? What do kids grab outside of school to drink? Coca cola has initiated a healthy campaign to fight obesity, which is good but old habits are hard to break.. what do people ask for at the bar? a Captain n juice? Jack n juice? no my friend... Coke !!

Topic.Title: DO you think Warren Buffett will increase his stake in Coca-Cola ?

Message.Msg: He has no reason to buy more KO. His yield on cost is incredible and it easily pays for itself through dividends that he deploys to other. KO at current price levels is not for him to buy.
